tool_description: Evaluates course content for accessibility compliance with WCAG guidelines and provides remediation recommendations.

content_ids.description: List of content identifiers to check for accessibility

compliance_level.description: WCAG compliance level: A, AA, or AAA

check_categories.description: Categories to check: perceivable, operable, understandable, robust

error_messages: Invalid content_ids: One or more content identifiers do not exist.
Invalid compliance_level: Use A, AA, or AAA.
Invalid check_categories: Use perceivable, operable, understandable, or robust.
Too many items: Maximum 50 content items can be checked at once.
usage: Provide content_ids array to check accessibility compliance. Optionally specify compliance_level and check_categories to focus the evaluation.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, non_compliant, needs_review

recommendations.description: List of recommended actions to improve accessibility
